frontMatter.title: Refactoring and Design Patterns
frontMatter.summary: Refactoring is a controllable process of improving code without creating new functionality. Design Patterns are typical solutions to the commonly occurring problems in software design.

next.title: 一个很不错的学习设计模式的网站
next.summary: 看到一个很不错的学习设计模式的网站，分享一下😁 学不会设计模式，是因为你还没用过这个神奇的网站！
